alert.note: Alert for Inland Cameron; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 2:05PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Kenedy, northwestern Cameron and western Willacy Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 205 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Raymondville High School, or near Raymondville, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Raymondville, Lyford, Sebastian, San Perlita, Reber Memorial Library, Yznaga, Porfirio, Raymondville High School, Raymondville Police Department and Willamar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
